examples: […]  the intimate and cloistered loveliness of the chancel, with its pointed arcading, graceful ribbed vault and five narrow east lancets, led his attention on and focused it first upon the remote glow of the sanctuary.

entries.meaning: (uncountable, video games) The playing of arcade games.
examples: Whatever your taste in arcade games, one thing is certain: the world of home arcading has never been richer.
